dcterms:creator: Nikita Moghe
Siddhartha Arora
Suman Banerjee
Mitesh M. Khapra
dcterms:description: An English language movie conversation dataset containing approximately 9,000 movie chats and 90,000 utterances. Every chat is associated with background knowledge resources such as the plot, reviews, and comments about the movie. The dataset is designed for generating or retrieving responses based on conversation history and the appropriate background resource.
dcterms:title: Holl-E dataset
